newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia Timah plans name change to MNI.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia Timah plans name change to MNI.

text.p: Timah Langat Bhd said on Tuesday it was planning to change its name to MNI Holdings Bhd to reflect the company's new focus on insurance business.
In a circular to shareholders, Timah said the name-change is subject to shareholder approval at an extraordinary meeting on November 22.
Malaysia National Insurance Sdn Bhd (MNI), the country's third biggest insurance company, was in May injected into the then small manufacturing firm.
State investment fund Permodalan Nasional Bhd holds an 80 percent equity in the enlarged capital of Timah, after earlier selling its 70 percent stake in MNI to Timah.
